com.b07.f19.e3

Class SingleLectureCourse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b07.f19.e3.SingleLectureCourse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Course

    public class SingleLectureCourse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Course
    This is an implementation of the Course interface. This class will allow for single lecture courses to be implemented. All documentation for the methods of this class can be found within the interface Course.
    Author:
    Joe

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleLectureCourse

        public SingleLectureCourse(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String code,
                           CourseDay courseDay,
                           int courseTime,
                           int lectureLength)
        Constructor for course without any exclusions
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the course
        code - the course code in format AAAA##
        courseDay - the day the course takes place on
        courseTime - the time the course is scheduled - must be between 8-20
        lectureLength - the length of the course, must be greater than 0 and less than 4

      • SingleLectureCourse

        public SingleLectureCourse(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String code,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Course> excludedCourses,
                           CourseDay courseDay,
                           int courseTime,
                           int lectureLength)
        Constructor for a course that has exclusions
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the course
        code - the course code in format AAAA##
        excludedCourses - an array of courses to be excluded by this course.
        courseDay - the day the course takes place on
        courseTime - the time the course is scheduled - must be between 8-20
        lectureLength - the length of the course, must be greater than 0 and less than 4
